immediate_actions: Ice first 48 hours (20 mins every few hours)

seek_medical_attention.timeframe: If very large, severe pain, or bruising easily without cause

full_protocol_text: Bruise: Ice 20 mins several times daily for 48 hours to reduce swelling. Elevate. After 48hrs switch to warm compress. Take ibuprofen. Heals 2-4 weeks. Color changes are normal.
